ARABIC: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَكَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآ أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ أَصْحَٰبُ ٱلْجَحِيمِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But those who are kafir and deny Our Signs, are the Companions of the Blazing Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But those who disbelieve and deny Our revelations are the people of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for those who disbelieve and give the lie to Our signs, they are destined for the Blazing Flame.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: However, the unbelievers who have called Our revelations lies will have hell for their dwelling.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And those who disbelieve and deny Our signs – it is they who are the people of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they who disbelieve and deny Our Ayat are those who will be the dwellers of the Hell-fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And (as for) those who disbelieve and reject our communications, these are the companions of the name.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And the unbelievers, who cried lies to Our signs -- they shall be the inhabitants of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they who disbelieve and deny Our revelations, such are rightful owners of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: but those who deny the truth and deny Our signs are destined for Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And those who disbelieve and belie Our signs, they shall be the fellows of the Flaming Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: As for those who are faithless and deny Our signs, they shall be the inmates of hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who reject faith and deny our signs will be companions of Hell-fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They who disbelieve and deny our Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) are those who will be the dwellers of the Hell-fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As for those who disbelieve and belie Our verses, they shall become the companions of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: As for those who disbelieve and reject Our revelations—these are the inmates of Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But those who disbelieve and deny Our signs - those are the companions of Hellfire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:10] And they who disbelieve and deny Our signs — they shall be the inhabitants of Hell-fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they who disbelieve) in Allah (and deny Our revelations) Muhammad and the Qur'an, (such are rightful owners of hell) the dwellers of the Fire.
